1203740.name: Kz CTool
1203740.description:
What is Kz CTool ?

Kz CTool is a powerfull cryptology tool. Developed for improve user's security and privacy.
We bored old file encryption method so we created the best one. Kz CTool has two encryption method for your files. First one is classic decyrpt/encrypt for your files (Boring, right ?). Second method is decyrpt/encrypt files for their owner. It means doesn't matter who knows your password if solver wasn't you, your files are never be decrypted.

Features


  • Three encryption method.
  • Low memory usage.
  • 0% Byte loss.
  • Protection with password(Classic one).
  • Kz Protection method.
  • Protection without password.
